creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund, the Louis W. Hill, Jr. Fund, gift of funds from the Asian Art Affinity Group, and the Japanese Art Miscellaneous Purchase Fund
description: couple engaged in intercourse, surrounded by brightly-colored fabrics; woman is bare-breasted; black fabric with blue, pink and white wave designs at left; screen with chrysanthemum pattern at top left; text above man and in URC
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Yoshiwara Courtesan with Samurai Customer, from Selections from the Brocade Quarter (E-awase kingaishō)
